TEXT.English: The Emperor level is for experienced players. You will play under significant research, unit production, upkeep and happiness penalties, while the AI receives even more advantages in these areas.
TEXT.French: Le niveau Empereur est destiné aux joueurs expérimentés. Vous subirez d'importantes pénalités en matière de science, de production d'unités, d'entretien et de bonheur, tandis que l'IA recevra encore plus de bonus quant à ces aspects du jeu.
TEXT.German: Die Kaiser-Stufe ist für erfahrene Spieler. Ihr werdet unter erheblichen Forschungs-, Produktions-, Unterhalts- und Zufriedenheits-Mali, während die KI in diesen Bereichen noch mehr Vorteile erhält.
TEXT.Italian: The Emperor level is for experienced players. You will play under significant research, unit production, upkeep and happiness penalties, while the AI receives even more advantages in these areas.
TEXT.Spanish: The Emperor level is for experienced players. You will play under significant research, unit production, upkeep and happiness penalties, while the AI receives even more advantages in these areas.

TEXT.English: The Heir difficulty is the right level for beginners. Your cities receive additional happiness and your research, unit production and upkeep costs are lower than those of your AI opponents.
TEXT.French: La difficulté Héritier est appropriée pour les débutants. Vos villes bénéficient de bonheur supplémentaire et la science, la production d'unités et l'entretien vous coûtent moins cher que pour vos adversaires contrôlés par l'IA.
TEXT.German: Dieser Schwierigkeitsgrad ist die richtige Stufe für Anfänger. Eure Städte erhalten zusätzliche Zufriedenheit und Eure Forschungs-, Produktions- und Unterhaltskosten sind geringer als die Eurer KI-Gegner
TEXT.Italian: The Heir difficulty is the right level for beginners. Your cities receive additional happiness and your research, unit production and upkeep costs are lower than those of your AI opponents.
TEXT.Spanish: The Heir difficulty is the right level for beginners. Your cities receive additional happiness and your research, unit production and upkeep costs are lower than those of your AI opponents.

TEXT.English: Monarch players play under the same conditions as Regents, but will face more formidable AI opponents.
TEXT.French: Les joueurs Monarques sont soumis aux mêmes conditions que les Régents, mais feront face à des adversaires IA plus redoutables.
TEXT.German: Monarchen-Spieler spielen unter denselben Bedingungen wie Regenten, stehen allerdings stärkeren KI-Gegnern gegenüber.
TEXT.Italian: Monarch players play under the same conditions as Regents, but will face more formidable AI opponents.
TEXT.Spanish: Monarch players play under the same conditions as Regents, but will face more formidable AI opponents.

TEXT.English: Can you beat this game on this level and prove that you are truly a Paragon? Compared to Emperor, your AI adversaries will receive even more unit production and research advantages.
TEXT.French: Pouvez-vous gagner à ce niveau et prouver que vous êtes un vrai Parangon? Par rapport au niveau Empereur, vous adversaires IA recevront encore plus de bénéfices en production et en science.
TEXT.German: Könnt Ihr dieses Spiel auf diesem Level gewinnen und beweisen, dass ihr wirklich ein Paragon seid? Verglichen mit Kaiser werden Eure KI-Widersacher noch mehr Produktions- und Forschungsvorteile erhalten.
TEXT.Italian: Can you beat this game on this level and prove that you are truly a Paragon? Compared to Emperor, your AI adversaries will receive even more unit production and research advantages.
TEXT.Spanish: Can you beat this game on this level and prove that you are truly a Paragon? Compared to Emperor, your AI adversaries will receive even more unit production and research advantages.

TEXT.English: As a Regent, you are facing a fairly balanced challenge and are evenly matched in terms of modifiers with your AI adversaries.
TEXT.French: En tant que Régent, vous aurez un défi équilibré et des modificateurs comparables à ceux des adversaires contrôlés par l'IA.
TEXT.German: Als Regent, Ihr steht einer relativ balancierten Herausforderung gegenüber und seid auf demselben Level wie Eure KI-Widersacher was Modifikatoren angeht.
TEXT.Italian: As a Regent, you are facing a fairly balanced challenge and are evenly matched in terms of modifiers with your AI adversaries.
TEXT.Spanish: As a Regent, you are facing a fairly balanced challenge and are evenly matched in terms of modifiers with your AI adversaries.
